casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Sol Vasquez (11550)

Foti, Lavery and Freedman, Js.

Argued September 20 decision released October 5, 1993 Denise Derby, special public defender, for the appellant (defendant). David J. Sheldon, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were John A. Connelly, state’s attorney, and Edward Riceiardi, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
